data.name: The Old Bank Steak Taverna & Bar
data.description: Following the success of our Greek-inspired outside dining menu in April, Brighton has spoken! The combination of Greek meze, and our Classic Steak, Ribs and Wings has proven to be a winner. Join us to sample a little taste of Greece, an Old Bank Classic or just pop into the bar for cocktail, a beer, a whatever – we’ll be pleased to serve you.
data.address: 120 St. Georges Road Kemptown Village, Brighton BN2 1EA England

data.name: Brighton Bierhaus
data.description: Brighton Bier brewery tap - international award winning brewery. 6 cask beers and 13 keg beers from Brighton Bier alongside some of the best beers we can find from around the UK and across the world. Pizzas from Pizzaface, along with a range of pub snacks.

data.name: Roxanne@TheVerdict
data.description: The Verdict is a Jazz Club, Cafe and Bar. We run live music events throughout the week including free entry New Orleans Jazz each Monday night, featuring Gabriel Garrick with Beached Brass and Hat and Tidy Street Striders alternately. The cafe is open Mon-Fri from 8am until 5pm offering gorgeous breakfasts and lunches with vegan options, using local suppliers with a huge focus on freshness and quality. The Jazz Club itself is a beautifully soundproofed purpose built auditorium that seats 60 comfortably. Home to an Offenbach piano, bass amp, drum kit and PA this is a multi-functional space available for private hire; it works well for parties, workshops, film screenings, exercise classes and rehearsals/filming for music videos. It has hosted some of the finest jazz musicians in the world and is widely regarded as one of the best jazz venues in Europe by musicians and guests alike. The new management looks forward to seeing you!

data.name: Island Takeaway
data.description: A Caribbean takeaway restaurant, serving a range of dishes including popular dishes such as jerk chicken, curry goat, Oxtail, Rice and peas, stewed chicken, pepper steak, fish, chicken curry, veg curry, roti, dumplings etc.. We are passionate about providing great customer service and good food for good value for money.

data.name: Bom-Bane's

photo.caption: Jane on top of the cafe!!!!

data.description: Cafe in Brighton serving delicious homely food and hosting many a night of film, music and puppetry. Bom-Bane's is a licensed cafe-restaurant run by musician Jane Bom-Bane and situated in the Brighton (not the Hove) George St. It features delicious Belgian and other European dishes, along with the Aesop's Tables, Tablerone, TurnTable, Twenty-Seven Chimes Table, Uns-Table and Water Table... Please note - Tuesdays only open if we have a music night.

data.name: Junkyard Dogs
data.description: Junkyard Dogs is an arts cafe in kemptown, Brighton. We serve a great breakfast, delicious cakes and pastries as well as a gourmet hotdog menu. We have a cozy atmosphere, vinyl records you can listen to, a sun trap garden, super friendly staff. We are often open in the evenings for live music, comedy and other performances.Free wifi is available and there are plug sockets at every table. We are also available to hire for special ocassions and have a lovely theatre space which is also available to hire for rehearsals and performances.

data.name: The Anchor Bar
data.description: Cosy, atmospheric, quaint cafe, restaurant, bar based on Edward street, Brighton. Serving Mexican street food, craft beers, hand selected ales and wines, and fantastic cocktails. With food, drink, beer garden and table service, we welcome everyone including dogs! Also available for hire and private functions. Please contact to book a table. Also offer extensive vegan menu, and a sunday lunch!

reviews.title: I stopped in for a quickie

data.name: Marlborough Pub and Theatre
data.description: Only a stone's throw from both the Pier and the Pavilion the Marlborough is one of Brighton's oldest and quirkiest public houses, a real local gem - seemingly tucked away from it all while being smack bang in the heart of the city. Its unique personality is partly due to it's history - rumours of tunnels leading to the Pavilion, debauchery and ghosts - and partly due to the murals and installations from local artists and the interesting calendar of events. Longtime a hub of the queer and LGBT community The Marlborough prides itself on providing a warm welcome to everyone looking for good vibes and fun times. The Marlborough is home to a 60 seat theatre (complete with proscenium arch and velvet curtains) upstairs, which means a constant flow of interesting characters both on stage and through the bar. We are delighted to be the home of Vegan Food Pimp serving great healthy food Tuesday - Sunday at the Marly.

data.name: Munchies’ Craft
data.description: Munchies’ Craft is your quirky and homey late evening coffee & cocktail house in Brighton town - a cheeky little getaway! This is a very women powered colourful place! Although, we believe in the power of women and colours, because these two can make anything attractive. Its colourfulness, from the atmosphere to the food and drinks, will cheer you up and lift up your mood if you’re feeling low. Yes! it’s small, but has a big heart! We serve breakfast, lunch, and Turkish Tapas, along with luscious desserts and surprising house cocktails. Besides, our local brand ''Craft House Coffee’s” glorious edition is definitely worth trying! Ah! And our fluffy Alex, the regular of our sofa, will melt your heart!

reviews.title: Great meze in a lovely place

data.name: The Setting Sun
data.description: Welcome to The Setting Sun, we are the proud new landlords bringing this much loved pub back; with the same stunning view after a thorough refurb. Come along for a drink, a feast and a fun time watching that famous view of the Setting Sun across Hanover and beyond to the Brighton beachfront.

photo.caption: We came here for the first time. The staff were friendly and they were doing an offer for each m

data.name: Purezza Brighton

photo.caption: Come along and enjoy our wide range of delicious offerings

data.description: Vegan Italian restaurant with organic sourdough pizza, nutritious food dishes and great tasting plant-based desserts.
data.address: 12 St. James's Street, Brighton BN2 1RE England

data.name: Longrain
data.description: We have created a new brilliant fusion of South East Asian cuisine here at Longrain. Our concept with colourful and aromatic dishes to create the perfect harmony between for essential elements: Hot, Sour, Salty and Sweet. Every plate achieves that elusive, cuisine-defining balance of hot, sweet, salty, and sour. We carefully source the best ingredients, organic where possible, to use them in all of our sauce and paste and this make us uniquely different. This is also where the secret to the remarkable taste of our food lies, however sourcing the ingredients alone is not the key. We take the extra care of mixing and developing these recipes from scratch to perfection in order to deliver you with genuine and good food. Our menu is 90% gluten free.
data.address: 111 St. James's Street Kemptown, Brighton BN2 1TH England

data.name: Desi Indian Takeway
data.description: We are an eatery who staunchly believes that the first impressions last forever. Thus, ensuring that it is the grandest and pleasing experience of yours with us, we have crafted meticulously all the elements that make the affair of food a grand success. With the most compassionate heart to serve our customers, we strive to make each of their dining occasions the best in every possible way. Be it food, ambience, or hospitality, quality is certainly our recipe. To make this occasion even more pleasing, we have gone a step further providing the best on-time delivery services of food. You can now avail and enjoy our food at your own comfort place. All you need to do is download our app from the Google Play Store or the Apple App Store. In short span of time our representative will reach you with your food delivery. So enjoy the finest food with us now.

data.name: Edwards Kitchen

photo.caption: This is my little ray of sunshine, takeaway cafe serving a range of healthy, homemade and delicious dishes for every time of the day. Breakfast, Brunch and Lunch. Many vegan and vegetarian options. Locally Roasted and freshly ground coffee. Come visit

data.description: A small but perfectly formed take away cafe in Kemptown serving breakfast baps, brunch and lunch. Free range eggs, sausage and bacon (from Brighton Sausage company) plus veggie and vegan sausages. Real Patisserie bread. Freshly ground coffee with a choice of oat, soya and organic dairy milk. Freshly made daily choice of salads, sandwiches, soup, quiche and cakes. A one stop shop for all your breakfast, brunch and lunch needs plus perfect for picking up a picnic style lunchbox for the beach

data.name: Tarner Community Cafe

photo.caption: View of the café from the counter

data.description: Wendy's cosy cafe serves a daily menu plus homemade seasonal specials, yummy coffees, organic drinks and scrumptious cakes. Pop in for some good hospitality and a friendly place to meet your friends.

data.name: Indian Summer
data.description: Situated in the bustling lanes, snuggled between terre a terre and toni and guy. A beautiful victorian building with high ceilings and original features. Adorned with indian street images and candlelit walls, you are sure to enjoy your experience here

data.name: Village Thai
data.description: Welcome to the wonderful world of THAI , our kitchen duo whom have been married for over 20 years Andy and Tai hailing from Bangkok and Issam province in northern Thailand. They Bring real Authentic cooking skills to the shores of Brighton Shores. Settling in Brighton after finding their feet in the UK, We now have the pleasure of these amazing chefs who cook fresh from the Wok and to order. We are open 6 days a week Bringing their individual flare of Thai to Brighton. We have inside dining as well as a great outdoor space for alfresco dining.
